title: What does a VPN do? How do I set VPN parameters?
answer:
[Virtual Private Network (VPN) is a technology to build a private network on a public network, commonly used for communications within a large or medium enterprise or between communities. ]() 

 To set a VPN, perform the following operations: 

 On the home screen, touch Settings > Moreâ€¦ > VPN. (VPN requires the PIN or a password to unlock. See section 2.9 "xxx" for related settings.) 

 [On the VPN screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110874) on the upper right corner and enter the VPN name and the server address. ]() 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110875) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=110876)
